Downloading now.  If you can change it, I would recommend that you put either fsx or fs2004 in the title.  Most people only search those two key words, I only stumbled on it.  

Just to be clear, this is the update and this version does not work, or do not update because it causes the crack to not work?  Thanks.
Well, from the looks of it, this program is compatible with both FS9 and FSX. And the update.. well, that will make the crack fail, so don't update is what I'm getting anyway.
I don't usually comment but i wanted to say thanks. I really wanted this and it works perfectly. I am running it on windows vista 32bit with fsx. THANKS!!!
req: air hauler 4.1 service pack or comment link where i can find it thanks...
